Please note that the puzzle statements were used to determine the final positions.

|         |     1      |   2     |       3         |    4     |      5        |      6       |
| Food    | eggplant    | grapes   | pumpkin           | radish   | raspberry      | tomato        |
| Job     | chef         | entrepreneur | firefighter | manager | police-officer | writer        |

Puzzle Solution:

1. the person eating tomato (5) is on the right of the person eating radish (4)
2. the police-officer (6) is on the left of the person eating pumpkin (3)
3. the person eating pumpkin (3) is on the right of the person eating tomato (5)
4. the writer (7) is in an even position (6)
5. the police-officer (6) is somewhere to the left of the person eating eggplant (1)
6. the firefighter (8) is on the right of the person eating eggplant (1)
7. the person eating eggplant (1) is not the firefighter (8)
8. the person eating radish (4) is on the right of the manager (9)
9. the writer (7) is not the person eating eggplant (1)
10. the person eating eggplant (1) is on the left or right of the chef (2)
11. the person eating grapes (2) is on the left or right of the person eating eggplant (1)
12. the entrepreneur (3) is on the left or right of the person eating grapes (2)
13. the person eating tomato (5) is somewhere to the left of the person eating eggplant (1)
14. the person eating radish (4) is somewhere to the left of the chef (2)
#############
|         |     1      |   2     |       3         |    4     |      5        |      6       |
| Food    | eggplant    | grapes   | pumpkin           | radish   | raspberry      | tomato        |
| Job     | chef         | entrepreneur | firefighter | manager | police-officer | writer        |

#############
|             |       1        |    2      |      3       |      4       |     5       |    6     |
| Beverage    |     coffee      |  hot-chocolate  | lemonade | milk | sprite | water |
| Hobby       |   woodworking    | filmmaking | singing | sudoku | camping | board-games |
#############
Explanation:

1. milk is between woodworking and water
2. milk is to the right of woodworking, so it must be on the far right because it's also between woodworking and water.
3. lemonade is next to sudoku (either left or right).
4. woodworking is on the left of filmmaking.
5. lemonade is somewhere to the left of sprite.
